Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media are outraged over proposed budget cuts to key road programs that support regional productivity and road safety. The need for long-term investment in regional roads is emphasized and criticism is directed towards Dan Andrews. On another note people are stressed about the cost of living crisis and how it affects everyone but especially those on low incomes who are forced to make impossible sacrifices. The post provides a link for further information on the topic.
